mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(mem_id, mem_pw, mem_name, mem_phone, mem_email, mem_user) VALUES(#{memId}, #{memPw}, #{memName}, #{memPhone}, #{memEmail}, #{memUser})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM coupon c, member m WHERE m.mem_id = c.mem_id AND c.mem_id = #{memId}
SELECT * FROM member ORDER BY mem_id
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET mem_id = #{memId}, mem_pw = #{memPw}, mem_name = #{memName}, mem_phone = #{memPhone}, mem_email = #{memEmail}, mem_user = #{memUser} WHERE mem_id=#{memId}
